title: Geomicrobiology
description: Interactions between microorganisms and the geosphere, microbial energetics and genetics; geochemical controls on microbial diversity and activity.  Crosslisted with EAS 6765.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BIOL 4410 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 4418 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and EAS 3620 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
